rooms.description: A welcoming space with Art Deco influences including geometric patterns and elegant detailing. The entrance leads to the central courtyard.
A quiet retreat featuring built-in bookshelves and ambient lighting. Designed with Art Deco motifs and natural light through large windows facing the courtyard.
A spacious living area incorporating Art Deco decorative elements. Provides views to the central courtyard and is arranged for family gatherings.
Elegant dining space with geometric patterns on floors and walls, complementing Art Deco style aesthetics.
Fully equipped kitchen designed for modern cooking with traditional elements; includes an open layout adjoining the dining area.
A guest bedroom with Art Deco accents and comfortable furnishings.

openings.details: Features an Art Deco design with glass panels.
Large windows overlooking the courtyard for enhanced natural lighting.

features.description: A landscaped open space in the center of the apartment, designed to provide natural ventilation and a communal garden area. Vastu-compliant with auspicious direction placements.
Located on the first level, this space is designed for family entertainment with state-of-the-art sound and projection systems, ensuring privacy while maintaining Art Deco style elements.

rooms.description: A spacious master suite with an adjoining en-suite bathroom, designed to promote rest and relaxation while following Vastu principles for the family head's direction.
Two additional bedrooms arranged on opposite sides of the floor to maintain balance and positive energy flow according to Vastu norms.
Fully functional bathrooms designed for ease of access and flow.

openings.details: Provides natural ventilation with partial enclosure; includes safety railings and Art Deco detailing.
Large windows for optimal daylight, designed in line with Vastu guidelines to ensure positive energy flow.
